DOC.brief_summary: To assess if nelfinavir has any clinically meaninful effect on cardiac function, namely ECG evaluation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive. Body Mass Index (BMI) of approximately 18 to 30 kg/m2. Evidence or history of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric, neurologic, or allergic disease.
